name: crowd-funding
description: This project is a blog about technology. It allows us to create, edit, and add blog posts as well as look at a dashboard of posts and allows users to create a login.  ## Motivation The motivation behind this project was to allow for us to make a working blog site uses the MVC techcnology model we learned in unit 14 of the UT coding Bootcamp. ## Build status Build status of continus integration
